entry.title: Upcoming 2025 Symposium on Artificial Intelligence for Learning Health Systems (SAIL)

link.title: Upcoming 2025 Symposium on Artificial Intelligence for Learning Health Systems (SAIL)

entry.summary:
The Symposium on Artificial Intelligence for Learning Health Systems (SAIL) is an annual international conference launched in 2020 to explore the integration of artificial intelligence (AI) techniques into clinical medicine. SAIL will be held on May 6–9, 2025, in Río Grande, Puerto Rico.
Event Details:
Date: May 6–9, 2025 Location: Río Grande, Puerto Rico at the Hyatt Regency Grand Rese...

entry.title: Together for Better Health - A Summit with Friendship Baptist Church

link.title: Together for Better Health - A Summit with Friendship Baptist Church

entry.summary:
Join the Health Summit for a unique opportunity to learn, share, and engage with leaders in A.I. and healthcare — in partnership with the community!
Hosted at Friendship Missionary Baptist Church and welcoming over 200 participants, this summit is designed not just for scholars, but for everyone.
Unlike academic conferences, this event is grounded in community partnership and outreach. Sess...

entry.title: Upcoming 2025 Texas Medical Center AI Summit

link.title: Upcoming 2025 Texas Medical Center AI Summit

entry.summary: The TMC AI Summit will kicks off soon, with AI leaders from TMC institutions sharing insights on the state of our AI community. It features a scientific program with keynotes, research spotlights, and a student research showcase, a testament to the vibrant future of AI in medicine. entry.title: Call for Papers - IEEE/ACM CHASE 2025 – Join Us in New York City!

link.title: Call for Papers - IEEE/ACM CHASE 2025 – Join Us in New York City!

entry.summary:
We are excited to announce that the Call for Papers for the IEEE/ACM CHASE 2025 (Conference on Connected Health: Applications, Systems and Engineering Technologies) is now open!
Taking place from June 24-26, 2025, in the vibrant Manhattan, New York City, USA, this event brings together leading minds to address the challenges and innovations in enabling connected health worldwide.

entry.title: Upcoming 2024 AI In Health Conference
entry.summary:
The Ken Kennedy Institute at Rice University will host the 3rd annual AI in Health Conference on September 9-12, 2024. Dr. Xia Hu, one of our members, will serve as the conference chair, while Dr. Xiaoqian Jiang has been invited to deliver a presentation. Additionally, our member Dr. Cheryl Brown will also attend the conference.
The conference includes panels, technical talks, an exhibit hal...
